#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
 
int main() {
    int test;
    scanf("%d", &test);
    while(test--) {
        int n;
        scanf("%d", &n);
        if(n<=2) {
            int total=4*n;
            int ans=(total)*(total-1)*(total-2);
            ans/=6;
            printf("%d\n", ans);
        } else {
            int total=4*n;
            int ans=(total)*(total-1)*(total-2);
            ans/=6;
            total=n;
            int _omit=(total)*(total-1)*(total-2);
            _omit/=6;
            ans-=4*_omit;
            printf("%d\n", ans);
        }
    }
}
